meanings.definition: Not having been exposed to the sun to darken the skin.
meanings.sent1: Her untanned skin showed she had not spent much time outdoors.
meanings.sent2: The untanned leather looked pale compared to the darkened ones.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his untanned arms glowed in the dark.
meanings.sent4: The untanned canvas of the painting symbolized purity and innocence.
meanings.sent5: The untanned face stood out in the crowd of sun-kissed beachgoers.

meanings.definition: Not having been treated with tanning agents to darken the skin.
meanings.sent1: The untanned leather had a natural, light color.
meanings.sent2: She preferred her skin to remain untanned for health reasons.
meanings.sent3: The untanned shoes looked out of place among the rest.
meanings.sent4: His untanned hands contrasted sharply with his bronzed face.
meanings.sent5: The untanned wood gave the room a rustic charm.
